dt: {bc}a Roman official under the monarchy and the republic with the function of protecting the plebeian citizen from arbitrary action by the patrician magistrates
{bc}an unofficial defender of the rights of the individual

et: Middle English, from Latin {it}tribunus{/it}, from {it}tribus{/it} tribe
shortdef: a Roman official under the monarchy and the republic with the function of protecting the plebeian citizen from arbitrary action by the patrician magistrates
an unofficial defender of the rights of the individual

dt: {bc}a dais or platform from which an assembly is addressed

shortdef: a dais or platform from which an assembly is addressed
